name: Neongunner
description:
Neongunner is a fast-paced third-person rail-shooter in which you fight your way through hordes of enemies on an endless data highway.

This Project started as a Student Project at the Games-Academy Frankfurt(Germany).
it was made during the last 2 weeks of the semester due to our first project failing.

We decided to continue working on the project and upload it here for everyone to enjoy.

Although it is still far from done, we hope that you have fun with it.

In the game you must protect your data from the malevolent viruses coming after you whilst simultaniously avoiding the firewalls and bombs on the tracks.

Compete with friends and strangers via our online leaderboard. Try to get further and improve your score.

How far can you go?
